alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 12 at 6:51AM EST until March 12 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Southeast Middlesex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA and Eastern Plymouth MA Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 1 PM EST this afternoon to 11 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk
